title: Fresh Prince of Bel Air
description: A street-smart teen moves in with his wealthy relatives in Bel-Air.

title: Curb Your Enthusiasm
description: Larry David navigates the petty annoyances of daily life.

title: East Los High
description: A group of teens navigate life and love at a high school in East L.A.

title: Insecure
description: Follows the awkward experiences and racy tribulations of a modern-day African-American woman.

title: Snowfall
description: A look at the early days of the crack cocaine epidemic in Los Angeles during the early 1980s.

title: You People
description: A new couple and their families reckon with modern love amid culture clashes, societal expectations, and generational differences.

title: Training Day
description: A rookie cop spends his first day as a Los Angeles narcotics officer with a rogue detective.

title: Friday
description: Two friends must come up with $200 they owe a local bully or there won't be a Saturday.

title: La La Land
description: While navigating their careers in Los Angeles, a pianist and an actress fall in love while attempting to reconcile their aspirations.

title: The Lincoln Lawyer
description: An iconoclastic idealist runs his law practice out of the back seat of his Lincoln Town Car.

title: Entourage
description: Film star Vince Chase navigates the vapid terrain of Los Angeles with a close circle of friends and his trusty agent.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, and others intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption in LA.

title: The Shield
description: Follows a corrupt anti-gang unit in the LAPD as they blur the line between right and wrong.

title: Collateral
description: A cab driver finds himself hostage to a contract killer as he makes his rounds from hit to hit during one night in LA.

title: Straight Outta Compton
description: The story of N.W.A, their rise to fame, and the cultural impact of their controversial music.

title: Lucifer
description: The Devil relocates to Los Angeles and opens a nightclub while becoming a consultant to the LAPD.
A group of teenagers from Beverly Hills navigate high school, relationships, and drama.

title: NCIS: Los Angeles
description: An elite division of NCIS tracks and apprehends dangerous criminals that threaten national security.

title: Southland
description: A raw and authentic look at the lives of Los Angeles police officers on the streets of South Central.

title: The Big Lebowski
description: Jeff 'The Dude' Lebowski becomes involved in a complex kidnapping scheme in Los Angeles.

title: Bosch
description: An LAPD homicide detective works to solve crimes while facing challenges from his own past.

title: Barry
description: A hit man from the Midwest moves to Los Angeles and gets caught up in the city's theatre arts scene.

title: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
description: An actor and his stunt double navigate the changing film industry in 1969 Los Angeles.

title: The Rookie
description: A middle-aged man joins the LAPD and navigates the challenges of starting over in a dangerous new career.

title: Californication
description: A troubled writer struggles to balance fatherhood, career, and his love life in Los Angeles.

title: Hollywood
description: A group of aspiring actors and filmmakers in post-World War II Hollywood try to make it big.

title: The Bling Ring
description: A group of fame-obsessed teens use the internet to track celebrities' whereabouts and rob their homes.

title: Chinatown
description: A private detective uncovers a web of corruption in Los Angeles involving water rights and murder.

title: L.A. Confidential
description: As corruption grows in 1950s Los Angeles, three policemen investigate a series of murders with their own brand of justice.

title: To Live and Die in L.A.
description: A secret service agent goes after a counterfeiter in the seedy parts of Los Angeles.

title: BoJack Horseman
description: A washed-up TV star horse tries to find meaning in his life with the help of his friends in Hollywood.

title: The L Word
description: Follows the lives of a group of lesbian friends in Los Angeles as they deal with love and careers.

title: A Star is Born
description: A musician helps a young singer find fame as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral in L.A.

title: The Nice Guys
description: In 1970s Los Angeles, a mismatched pair of private eyes investigate the disappearance of a teenage girl.

title: Swingers
description: A group of friends struggle with life and love in Los Angeles while exploring the modern dating scene.

title: End of Watch
description: Two LAPD officers find themselves targeted by a cartel after uncovering a stash house in South Central LA.

title: Venice Beach Chronicles
description: A deep dive into the culture, people, and evolution of Venice Beach, Los Angeles.

title: Baywatch
description: Lifeguards uncover a criminal plot that threatens the future of the bay in this action-comedy based in LA.

title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
description: Although set in New York, the show was largely filmed on sets and stages in Los Angeles.
